definition: cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Sheldon:Only nine more months to comic-con.
sentences.chinese: 还有九个月就到动漫盛会了。

sentences.english: My plan is to turn Pleasant Goat into the national animation brand of China.
sentences.chinese: 我计划将’喜羊羊’系列打造成中国动漫品牌的代表。

sentences.english: Zuo Jin's style of humor has also served him well in his career as a cartoonist.
sentences.chinese: 左晋的幽默气质，更好地用在了他的动漫事业上。
动漫电玩节共吸引了170家参展商。

sentences.english: Anime fans by Dan Zhu own micro-blog wrote.
sentences.chinese: 动漫爱好者朱依丹在自己的微博上这样写道。

sentences.english: Semiotics is the bridge between people and the Game and Animation.
sentences.chinese: 符号学即是人与游戏动漫沟通的桥梁。

sentences.english: This article compares operation mode and development experience of abroad mobile MMVA such as mobile comic.
sentences.chinese: 本文对比国外手机动漫业务的运营模式和发展经验。

sentences.english: Question:why most local cartoon can't be popular ?
sentences.chinese: 为什么本土动漫不能大红大紫？

sentences.english: I will briefly introduce some of my favourite Comics & Anime or Comic Writers here.
sentences.chinese: 这里会简略地介绍一些我喜欢的动漫画或漫画家。

sentences.english: With the animation network, make Chinese animation industry leader.
sentences.chinese: 一起动漫网，做中国动漫产业的领军者。

sentences.english: With the animation network, make Chinese animation industry leader.
sentences.chinese: 一起动漫网，做中国动漫产业的领军者。

sentences.english: Manga is Japanese for comic or cartoon.
sentences.chinese: “manga”一词在日语中是动漫的意思。

sentences.english: Have you seen the cartoon Rozen Maiden ?
sentences.chinese: 你们看过《蔷薇少女》这部动漫吗？

sentences.english: Manga is not read in the same way as, say, the Beano.
sentences.chinese: 看动漫和看Beano这样的连环画是不一样的。

sentences.english: Your diaper bag is covered with anime character pins.
sentences.chinese: 你家的尿布袋夹子是动漫人物。

sentences.english: This is determined by the nature of ACG industry.
sentences.chinese: 这是由动漫产业的性质决定的。

definition: two-dimensional/the fictional worlds of anime, comics and games
voice actor (loanword from Japanese 声優 seiyū)
Dragon Ball, Japanese manga and anime series
Death note (Japanese: デスノート), translation of cult manga series by author ŌBA Tsugumi 大場鶇|大场鸫[Da4 chang3 Dong1] (pen-name) and illustrator OBATA Takeshi 小畑健[Xiao3 tian2 Jian4]
Crayon Shin-chan (クレヨンしんちゃん), Japanese manga and anime series popular in China
